TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, things get wierd...

I wish that TRF became canon

WHY WOULD YOU WISH THAT? ARRGH!

Granted, I refuse to grant that horrid wish! It's not classy...

I wish this wish dosen't get sniped

Granted, it get ninja'd

I wish to get the alicorn amulet

Granted, but Molestia tracks you cause you have it... and yeah, the rest is history

I wish that the RBF wish was never wished

Granted, but then we wouldnt be here.

I wish people would look at my MLP reaction thread(and tell me where to put it on the fourms *wink*)
Granted, It's there, but I don't look at it because knowing you, I won't like it.
It wont be biased agaist ponies. It will be more of a summary of the episode and how much i liked it or not with corgi faces. I am not attempting to offend anyone.

Ok then.

I have nothing to Corrupt, SYSTEM ERROR- Annoyingorbits.wishcorrupter has stopped working, What do?

uh

I wish this sentence was false.

there ye go
@Theattackcorgi I would go on that thread
Lol. I just watched 1-3 and i must say its annoying me....well its hard to explain but its not good.

Granted, the thread get back on tracks

I wish to have a magic wand

(The whole thing is overated, but the frist episode are just there to set the universe, in the 2th season, there's Tron and Back to the Futur refferences)

Edited October 30, 2013 by mrrpamplemousse

Granted, but it backfires and kills you

I wish i never watched trf music video

Granted, you never saw anything from WoodenToaster

I wish for a new original track

Granted. You are transported back in time. Thus you watch it again. You make the wish again. You get TARDIS'ed again. ETC.

I wish for better graphics.

Ninja'd

Damn you, mrrpamplemouse.
Whahaha no ninjas for you san

Granted,this thread is deleted and everyone dies and then eat pies and then die again

i wish for a Safe pie,while i'm alive,that has no poison and cannot kill me in any way.

Granted, Pink huricane (don't kill you but it's annoy you to psychotic state)

I wish for science of demographic phenomena
granted but the giver has no idea what that even means (@ the corgi the middle to end of the first seson are better though there are some "slow" episods in there)

No wish, no hope?

I wish to have great anthropoligical articles to read

I still have no idea what that is... so same as above

I wish to stop for geting the second part

Granted, what???

I wish I could change my user name, I'd change it to Rocktavia.

Granted, but that username is already taken.

I wish to travel through 6th dimensional phase space.

Granted, but your brain cannot understand what it see

I wish to run at 50mph

Granted, but you can never stop.

I wish for a quadcopter.
